data: European Commission, Directorate-General for Employment, Social Affairs and Inclusion, Health, Safety and Hygiene at Work Unit

Study to collect updated information for a limited number of substances with a view to analysing the health, socio-economic and environmental impacts in connection with possible amendments of Directive 2004/37/EC of the European Parliament and of the Council of 29.4.2004 on the protection of workers from the risks related to exposure to carcinogens or mutagens at work
European Commission, Directorate-General for Employment, Social Affairs and Inclusion, Health, Safety and Hygiene at Work Unit
Development and design of a structural model for the construction and implementation of an EU OSH information system
